overview: When Dee Williams looks up from her screen, she sees Scarlett Sage wearing headphones and dancing a little as she comes into her office. Too busy staring at Scarletts hot body, she has trouble concentrating on her work. Kenzie Reeves and Mackenzie Moss suggest that all three of them fool around and dirty up London River's house as revenge for her bitchy attitude. Even though Alina Lopez is hesitant, she's having trouble resisting her hot friends and all three enjoy themselves. Although things are initially awkward between them, Jill Kassidy's constant presence and innocence endears her to Angela White. She finds herself looking forward to seeing Jill every day after work. She's more to Angela than just a housemaid.
title: Maid for Each Other
